name: L##p
description:
Controls

Keyboard - 

  • A/D to move
  • Space to jump
  • K to interact with switches

Controller (Xbox)

  • Left/right to move
  • A to jump
  • X to interact with switches

Team

  • Mark Zheng - Level Designer & Programmer
  • Andrew Clark - Programmer
  • Alex Nguyen - Programmer & Writer
  • Brian Beck - Artist & Playtester

If you notice the switches or jumps are not responsive, try using the windows build, it has better performance.
